mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.driver_code AS "docOfficework.id", a.driver_name AS "driverName", a.car_no AS "docCar.id", a.licence_no AS "licenceNo", a.comment AS "comment", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", c.officework_code AS "docOfficework.officeworkCode", c.officework_name AS "docOfficework.officeworkName", d.car_code AS "docCar.carCode", d.car_no AS "docCar.carNo", a.remark AS "remark"
LEFT JOIN doc_officework c ON c.id = a.driver_code LEFT JOIN doc_car d ON d.id = a.car_no
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_driver a
AND a.driver_code LIKE '%'||#{driverCode}||'%' '%'+#{driverCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{driverCode}, '%')
AND a.driver_name LIKE '%'||#{driverName}||'%' '%'+#{driverName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{driverName}, '%')
AND a.car_no LIKE '%'||#{carNo}||'%' '%'+#{carNo}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{carNo}, '%')
AND a.licence_no LIKE '%'||#{licenceNo}||'%' '%'+#{licenceNo}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{licenceNo}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_driver( driver_code, driver_name, car_no, licence_no, comment, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{docOfficework.id}, #{driverName}, #{docCar.id}, #{licenceNo}, #{comment}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_driver SET driver_code = #{docOfficework.id}, driver_name = #{driverName}, car_no = #{docCar.id}, licence_no = #{licenceNo}, comment = #{comment}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
